user_title.description: Required, should be the like "Mr." or "Mrs."

name.description: Optional, the name of the user

target_driver.description: Required, the person who will drive the car

expertise.description: Required, number from 0 to 10 to mark how deep user know cars

family_size.description: Optional, the family size of user, should be a number

price_sensitivy.description: Optional, the price sensitivy of the user for buying a car

residence.description: Optional, where the user live, format should be "country+province+city"

parking_conditions.description: Optional, the parking conditions of the user

connection_id.description: Optional, the user id for another connection user

connection_phone_number.description: Optional, the phone number of the connection
